name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81847
title: MongoDB must provide audit record generation capability for DoD-defined auditable events
script:
auditLog="auditLog"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
   log=$(grep -i "${auditLog}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#")
    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
      echo "Can't find $auditLog within $checkfile"
      exit 1
    else
      echo "$auditLog exist within $checkfile"
      exit 0
    fi
    else
      echo "$checkfile does not exist"
      exit 1
    fi
